sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-experience', templateUrl: './experience.component.html', styleUrls: ['./experience.component.scss'] }) export class ExperienceComponent { }

I pride myself on being...



Creative

I love coming up with creative ideas to better my life and those around me. I have always had an exploratory mindset, constantly tinkering and building, questioning why things are as they are, and devoting time and energy to create. I just love building things!

Dedicated

When I invest my time and effort, I go "full force". I will stay up late into the night to figure out a logical error or to finish a component. I don't stop until the project is done, and I never give up on anything until I have exhausted all options.

Intelligent

I try my best to listen to others and to absorb their thoughts and ideas. I genuinely enjoy learning new things, working with new technologies and ideas, and I am a huge history buff and political junky. Exploring deep and important issues and comversations is extremely engaging for me.

Genuine

Sometimes to my own detriment, I am brutally honest. I am not shy to be myself no matter what anyone else will think, and I strongly stick to my principles and intuition. You will always know what I am thinking, I am an open book. Don't believe me? Ask my wife lol
